title: Braised beef tortellini with wild mushroom sauce
description: This dish brings together the wonderful flavours of braised beef and wild mushrooms. Homemade pasta takes a bit of time and practice but is defintiely worth the effort.To make this dish you will need a pasta machine.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
300g/10½oz '00' pasta flour, plus extra for dusting
250g/9oz wild mushrooms (chanterelles, girolles, ceps, button mushrooms, morelles)
